name: Journey to the center of the body
name_original: Journey to the center of the body
description:
Kill the bacteria, avoid the enzymes. This is an endless runner game with a twist.

This is a game about real bacteria that affect people. We thought this game would be relevant because of the current pandemic. The aim was to also create a library along with the game, with information regarding all the infections these bacteria cause as a way to create awareness but we ran out of time before we could finish it. We hope to finish it in the future but for now I hope you guys enjoy this version :)

Controls:

Press the left arrow key to move left and the right arrow key to move right.

This game also supports touch. Touch the left side of the screen to move left and the right side of the screen to move right.
